alert.note: Alert for Edgefield; McCormick; Saluda (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 6:14PM EDT until August 07 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Edgefield County in central South Carolina... Southwestern Saluda County in central South Carolina... Northeastern McCormick County in central South Carolina... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 614 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Mccormick County Airport, or 17 miles south of Greenwood, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Edgefield, McCormick, Johnston, Ridge Spring, Mccormick County Airport, Saluda County Airport, Edgefield County Airport, Trenton, Parksville, Ward, Plum Branch, Lick Fork Campground, Strom Thurmond High School, Harmony, Pleasant Lane, Mt Vintage, Northside Fire Station Main, Cleora, Colliers, and Whitetown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
